title: 6-digit Code Login - Successful Authentication
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using a valid 6-digit numeric code and that the token is securely stored.

steps.description: Navigate to the 6-digit code login page.
Input a valid 6-digit numeric code.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the Home Dashboard.
Check that the authentication token is securely stored in the client.

title: 6-digit Code Login - Invalid Code Handling
description: Verify that login fails with an invalid 6-digit code and appropriate error messages are displayed; rate limiting is enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to the 6-digit code login page.
Input an invalid 6-digit code (non-existent or malformed).
Submit the login form multiple times exceeding allowed attempts.
Verify that login is rejected with an error message on each attempt.
After exceeding attempts, verify that further login attempts are blocked or delayed due to rate limiting.

title: Share Token Login - Successful Authentication and Redirect
description: Verify that users can log in using a valid 64-character hexadecimal share token, which authenticates and redirects them appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to the share token login route.
Input a valid 64-character hexadecimal share token.
Submit the token.
Verify that user is authenticated and redirected to corresponding project page.
Check secure token storage for the session.

title: Share Token Login - Invalid Token Handling
description: Test login with invalid or tampered share tokens to verify error handling and prevention of unauthorized access.

steps.description: Navigate to the share token login route.
Input invalid or corrupted share tokens.
Submit the token.
Verify login is rejected with a clear error message.
Confirm no tokens are stored or session created.

title: Admin Preview Token Login - One-time Use
description: Verify that admin preview token logins authenticate once and the token cannot be reused, with tokens stored securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin preview token login page.
Enter a valid one-time admin preview token.
Submit token and authenticate.
Confirm successful authentication and redirection to admin preview dashboard.
Attempt to reuse the same token for login again.
Validate that reuse login attempt fails with an appropriate error.

title: Home Dashboard - Project Status and Contacts Display Correctly
description: Verify that the Home Dashboard renders project information accurately including status badges with correct color coding and contact details.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Home Dashboard.
Check that the project status badge is present with the correct color according to status.
Verify that contact persons and their details are displayed correctly.
Confirm photo dates and schedule reminders display if applicable.

title: Home Dashboard - Schedule Reminder Dialog with Snooze
description: Verify that the photo date schedule reminder dialog appears appropriately, that snooze functionality works, and that snooze state is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to Home Dashboard where a photo date exists with a schedule reminder.
Confirm schedule reminder dialog shows up.
Use the snooze option and close the dialog.
Confirm that the dialog does not reappear within the snooze period.
Reload the page and verify snooze state is retained from LocalStorage.

title: Home Dashboard - Share Functionality with Copy and Native Share
description: Verify that the dashboardâ€™s sharing options allow users to share project links via native share or clipboard copy with corresponding toast notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to Home Dashboard.
Click the share button and use native share if available.
Confirm native share dialog appears and share action completes.
Use the copy to clipboard option for project link.
Confirm that the link is copied and a success toast notification is displayed.

title: Sample Photo Gallery - Thumbnail Grid and Loading
description: Verify that the sample photo gallery loads all thumbnails correctly in a responsive grid on desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sample Photos gallery page.
Confirm that thumbnails appear in a grid layout.
Validate that the grid is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes.
Verify no broken images or layout issues.

title: Sample Photo Gallery - Lightbox Viewer and Zoom/Pan
description: Verify lightbox is opened on thumbnail click with full-screen image, supports pinch, wheel zoom, double-tap zoom, keyboard navigation, and pan controls.

steps.description: Click on a sample photo thumbnail.
Confirm that lightbox opens full screen showing the selected image.
Perform pinch zoom gesture on touch device.
Validate smooth zoom in/out behavior.
Use mouse wheel on desktop to zoom.
Validate zoom updates smoothly.
Double-tap the image on touch device.
Check that image zooms appropriately.
Use arrow keys to navigate next and previous photos.
Verify images change accordingly without errors.
Use pan gestures or drag mouse to move zoomed image.
Ensure smooth pan interaction.

title: Order Data - Display and PDF Download
description: Verify order data page correctly displays detailed contact info, school/class details, design preferences, AI-generated summaries, and supports PDF download.

steps.description: Navigate to Order Data page.
Check detailed contact information is displayed accurately.
Verify school and class details with counts and design preferences are visible.
Confirm AI-generated summary and tags are shown correctly.
Click the PDF download button.
Validate that the PDF file downloads correctly and is formatted properly.

title: Missing Persons Module - Lazy Loading and Reactive Search/Filtering
description: Verify the Missing Persons module loads only when navigated to and supports reactive search with filters for students and teachers without photos, displaying correct groups and statistics.

steps.description: Access application and navigate away from Missing Persons page.
Confirm Missing Persons module is not loaded initially.
Navigate to Missing Persons page.
Verify module loads lazily with no errors.
Enter search terms and apply filters for students and teachers.
Confirm search and filters update results reactively.
Verify results are grouped properly, and statistics update accordingly in real time.

title: Responsive Navbar - Dynamic Layout and Mobile Drawer with Accessibility
description: Verify navbar switches dynamically on resize using ResizeObserver, mobile drawer slides in with scroll lock, and keyboard accessibility with focus trapping.

steps.description: Load application on desktop screen size.
Navbar displays in desktop mode.
Resize the window to mobile breakpoint.
Navbar switches to mobile mode dynamically without flicker.
Click hamburger menu to open drawer.
Drawer slides in smoothly and page scroll is locked.
Navigate through drawer menu with keyboard tab and shift+tab.
Focus traps inside the drawer and navigation is accessible.
Close drawer and verify scroll unlocks.

title: Zoom Directive - Multi-Input Zoom and Pan Operations
description: Validate that the zoom directive supports mouse wheel, touch pinch, double-tap zoom, drag panning, and keyboard controls with GPU acceleration and stable performance.

steps.description: Attach zoom directive to image element.
Perform mouse wheel zoom in and out.
Zoom updates smoothly with GPU acceleration.
Perform pinch zoom gesture on touch device.
Zoom changes as expected with no lag.
Double-tap the image to zoom in and out.
Zoom toggles correctly.
Drag the zoomed image to pan around.
Pan operations are smooth and consistent.
Use keyboard controls for zooming.
Zoom level changes as per keyboard input.
Verify no memory leaks occur after repeated zoom/pan actions.

title: Toast Notifications - Appearance, Types, and Auto-hide
description: Verify toast notifications appear promptly on different triggers with correct message types (success, error, info), proper animations, and auto-hide after timeout.

steps.description: Trigger a success toast (e.g., after copy to clipboard).
Confirm success toast displays with correct message and styling.
Trigger an error toast (e.g., failed save).
Confirm error toast displays with correct styling and message.
Trigger an info toast.
Validate info toast appearance.
Observe toasts auto-hide after configured timeout with smooth animation.

title: Clipboard Service - Copy and Toast Feedback
description: Verify that emails, phone numbers, and links can be copied to clipboard using the Clipboard service with immediate and correct toast notifications.

steps.description: Attempt to copy an email address using clipboard service.
Confirm email is copied to clipboard.
Toast notification indicating success appears.
Copy a phone number using clipboard service.
Phone number is copied and toast shows confirmation.
Copy a project link using clipboard service.
Link is copied with appropriate toast notification displayed.

title: Auth Guard and HTTP Interceptor - Session Validation and Redirect
description: Verify that auth guards prevent unauthorized access and HTTP interceptors detect expired or invalid tokens, clearing storage and redirecting to login seamlessly.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected route with a valid token.
Access is granted.
Expire or revoke the token manually or via backend.
Attempt to access protected routes or invoke API calls.
HTTP interceptor detects invalid token, clears token storage, and redirects to login page.
No application errors occur during this process.

title: Schedule Reminder Service - LocalStorage Persistence and Daily Limits
description: Verify that schedule reminders use LocalStorage to persist snooze state and enforce daily limits on reminder dialog visibility preventing repeated dialogs within snooze period.

steps.description: Trigger schedule reminder dialog on photo date.
Use snooze option.
LocalStorage entry is created or updated for snooze timestamp.
Reload app multiple times within snooze period.
Reminder dialog does not reappear during snooze.
Simulate passage of daily limit and range expiration.
Reminder dialog reappears as expected after snooze expiration.
